CatDescriptText: Miss Virginia Thompson, 831 Pennsylvania Avenue, Coraopolis, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 14, 1957, pg. 3, with question: "Do you think that the City of Pittsburgh should own and operate its transportation system (street cars and buses)?" answer reads: "Yes, I do. I think that there would be more efficient service and less traffic."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of a Virginia Thompson, wearing light colored hat, shirt, and long sleeved coat, standing in front of tree patterned curtains
